description.displayText: I've known Sara for over 30 years. She's a very loyal and compassionate person; she's also a very hard worker and takes her job very seriously. She loves what she does and is a valuable asset to any situation.
description.originalText: I've known Sara for over 30 years. She's a very loyal and compassionate person; she's also a very hard worker and takes her job very seriously. She loves what she does and is a valuable asset to any situation.

description.displayText: Sara helped care for my mother for over 5 years.  She was extremely dependable and always went the extra mile to help us.  She was available on a moments notice and we always knew that we could count on her.  Mom has since gone into an assisted living facility but we miss Sara everyday.  You will be very lucky to have her!
